mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT REPLY_NO, USER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE REF_BNO = #{boardNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
